channel.title: Adding Teleports to a 317 (MY VERSION!)

item.title: Adding Teleports to a 317 (MY VERSION!)
item.dc:creator: @drachtpkz123 drachtpkz123
item.description:
@drachtpkz123 wrote:

(SERVER SIDE)

Step 1: The sounds

First Declare this on client.java

public int GetWepSound(int i) { if(i == -1 && !specOn) // Unarmed { return 75; } if(i == 4151 && !specOn) // Whip { return 1080; } if(i == 4718 && !specOn) // DH Axe { return 1057; } if(i == 4755 && !specOn) // Veracs Flail { return 1059; } if(i == 4747 && !specOn) // Torags Hammers { return 1062; } if(i == 4726 && !specOn) // Guthan Warspear { return 1061; } if(i == 4753 && !specOn) // G maul { return 1079; } if(i == 1305 && !specOn) // D long { return 390; } if(i == 767 || i == 737 || i == 839 || i == 841 || i == 843 || i == 845 || i == 853 || i == 855 || i == 857 || i == 859 || i == 861 || i == 2883 || i == 4212 || i == 4214 || i == 4215 || i == 4216 || i == 4217 || i == 4218 || i == 4219 || i == 4220 || i == 4221 || i == 4222 || i == 4223 || i == 4226 || i == 4704 || i == 4734 || i == 4827 || i == 847 || i == 849 || i == 851 && !specOn) // Bows { return 361; } if(i == 863 || i == 864 || i == 865 || i == 866 || i == 867 || i == 868 || i == 869 || i == 870 || i == 871 || i == 872 || i == 873 || i == 874 || i == 875 || i == 876 || i == 6554 || i == 5654 || i == 5655 || i == 5656 || i == 5657 || i == 5658 || i == 5659 || i == 5660 || i == 5661 || i == 5662 || i == 5663 || i == 5664 || i == 5665 || i == 5666 || i == 5667 && !specOn) // Knife's { return 364; } if(i == 1321 || i == 1323 || i == 1325 || i == 1327 || i == 1329 || i == 1331 || i == 1333 || i == 4587 || i == 6611 && !specOn) // Scimitars { return 396; } if(i == 1265 || i == 1267 || i == 1269 || i == 1271 || i == 1273 || i == 1275 && !specOn) // Pick axes { return 381; } if(i == 1363 || i == 1365 || i == 1367 || i == 1375 || i == 1377 || i == 6589 || i == 1369 || i == 1371 || i == 1373 && !specOn) // Battle axes { return 399; } if(i == 1349 || i == 1351 || i == 1353 || i == 1355 || i == 1357 || i == 1359 || i == 1361 || i == 6739 && !specOn) // Normal Axes { return 400; } if(i == 1379 || i == 1381 || i == 1383 || i == 1385 || i == 1387 || i == 1389 || i == 1391 || i == 1393 || i == 1395 || i == 1397 || i == 1399 || i == 1401 || i == 1403 || i == 1405 || i == 1407 || i == 1409 || i == 2415 || i == 2416 || i == 2417 || i == 3053 || i == 3054 || i == 3055 || i == 3056 || i == 4170 || i == 4675 || i == 4710 || i == 6562 || i == 6563 || i == 6603 || i == 6726 || i == 6727 && !specOn) // Staff's { return 394; } if(i == 746 || i == 747 || i == 1203 || i == 1205 || i == 1207 || i == 1209 || i == 1211 || i == 1213 || i == 1215 || i == 1217 || i == 1219 || i == 1221 || i == 1223 || i == 1225 || i == 1227 || i == 1229 || i == 1231 || i == 1233 || i == 1235 || i == 5668 || i == 5670 || i == 5672 || i == 5674 || i == 5676 || i == 5678 || i == 5680 || i == 5682 || i == 5684 || i == 5686 || i == 5688 || i == 5690 || i == 5692 || i == 5694 || i == 5696 || i == 5698 || i == 5700 || i == 5702 || i == 6591 || i == 6593 || i == 6595 || i == 6597 || i == 5698 && !specOn) // Daggers { return 398; } else { return 396; } }

The
if(i == 746 || i == 747 || i == 1203 ||
i == 1205 || i == 1207 |
Are item idâ€™s And the return 398; or 400 or 396 or some else Is the music id.

And //Daggers or Knifes or Staffs are the Sort of weapons.

Step 2:(Let Is Play)

Now search for :

AttackingOn2.KillerId = playerId;
If you CANT find this 1 Try this other:
setAnimation(GetWepAnim(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));

Above that Add

PlayerSoundEffect(GetWepSound(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]),0,5);

Search for:

if(UseCrossBow && misc.random(5)==1 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 881){

Above it add:

PlayerSoundEffect(GetWepSound(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]),0,5);

OR JUST UNDER setAnimation(GetWepAnim(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])); add it Your choise

Declare This:

public void PlayerSoundEffect(int songid, int vol, int delay) { outStream.createFrame(174); outStream.writeWord(songid); outStream.writeByte(vol); outStream.writeWord(delay); }

Your done with server side

(CLIENT SIDE!)

(COMING SOON)
